doc.name: input-radiobutton
doc.description: wsfield elements of type radio are generally used in radio groups—collections of radio buttons describing a set of related options. Only one radio button in a given group can be selected at the same time. Radio buttons are typically rendered as small circles, which are filled or highlighted when selected.
doc.example:
Example radiobutton Initiële kosten en terugkerende kosten separaat doorberekenen.
Initiële kosten en terugkerende kosten als één abonnementstarief doorberekenen.
Anders, namelijk:
